text: Aporos khaŋ tɨgap mba gumgi gu mbigi nɨman Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ bun nzuai. Ana Zudaiŋ suaŋgi ndɨkndɨgi mbatɨgi ŋgarkav, nta mbevav mbe nzuai. Ana mba bunin mbe nzuav, Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ ki gavar buni vhuuin mbe nzuav, mbe hiav, khaŋ mbe nzuai “Zisas ana Fhe Bakɨme taagip wo gumgi gu mbigi ndir zav suaŋgiap farasarigi guma ma.”
